PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10162024-09-16PMO
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of ERIN MICHELLE BOBKIN, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office), until such time as she is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office).
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the remuneration of ERIN MICHELLE BOBKIN, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office), until such time as she is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office).
